name: Fuse (itch) (Internet Janitor)
description:
Fuse

Juggle flames and keep your fuse burning in a minimalist arcade experience inspired by games like Super Hexagon and Pipe Mania. Special thanks to coldrice, noyemi, and darzington for help beta-testing.

Note: this game contains flashing high-contrast elements. 

Controls
  •  ASWD or cursor keys: move.
  •  Space or enter: confirm in menus and place fuse sections.
  • Escape: pause game/open menu.
  • Command+F: toggle fullscreen mode.
  •  Gamepads are also supported and can be remapped as desired.
Requirements

Tested on MacOS as low as 10.14, as well as x64 Windows 10. For best results, ensure your computer is not a potato, but some other root vegetables might work fine.
